name: Tundra Slide
description:
Tundra Slide

Navigate slippery, icy terrain and collect items to solve puzzles. Made in two weeks for #LOWREZJAM2020. 

Theme: Slippery

Controls
  • Arrow keys (⬆️ ⬇️ ⬅️ ➡️ ) to move and interact with objects
  • Z/X to start/restart the game
Credits
  • Code, Art and Audio by Matthew Williams. Made with Pico-8
